title: University of Reading I We Two and Three
author: vinceconnare

comments.content:
Which one on that page are you referring to?

-------------------------------------  
_Inventor of the DVD rewinder_

<cite>The team says it can predict which words are likely to become extinct - citing "squeeze", "guts", "stick" and "bad" as probable first casualties.</cite>

Like, "I got it bad for my main squeeze"?
